Sudoku Board Module

class sudoku_board.SudokuBoard(board)[source]

Handles the validation process of the sudoku board from a 2D list and converts the board to integers

convert_board_to_int()[source]

Converts the 2D list of strings to a 2D list of integers

Returns:

True if the sudoku board is valid

Return type:

bool

Raises:

ValueError: – If the board is not initialised or contains invalid characters

validate_board()[source]
Validates the sudoku board by:

  • Ensuring the board is initialised

  • Checks the board size is 9x9

  • Checks for invalid numbers outside of 0-9

  • Detects duplicates in rows, columns and 3x3 squares

  • Confirms each row and column is of 9

Issues warnings:

  • For boards with has less than 17 starting values

  • For empty boards

Returns:

True is the board is valid, False otherwise

Return type:

bool

Raises:

ValueError: – If the board is not initialised If the board size is not 9x9 If the board contains invalid numbers outside of 0-9 If the board contains duplicates in rows, columns or 3x3 squares If the row or column length is not 9

Warning

UserWarning:

If the board has less than 17 starting values or is empty
